creator: dazed75@supereva.it
text: mod_jk2 ignore jvmRoute redirecting request on balanced application servers.

add a property route reflecting the value jvmroute of the server.xml in the 
jk2.properties Ex:

jk2.properties

.....
[channel.socket:localhost:8008]
port=8008
host=localhost
group=lb
lb_factor=1
route=tomcat1 

.....


server.xml

.....
    <Engine className="org.apache.catalina.core.StandardEngine" debug="0" 
defaultHost="localhost" jvmRoute="tomcat1" 
mapperClass="org.apache.catalina.core.StandardEngineMapper" name="root">
....
creator: dazed75@supereva.it
